breaking-link-warning.text1: Modifying these files or folders will break all links with existing Presentations.
breaking-link-warning.text2: If you are using this asset in any Presentation, the link for each must be manually updated in the Editor.

delete-files-folders-plural: {{count}} files and folders are about to be permanently deleted.
delete-files-plural: {{count}} files are about to be permanently deleted.
delete-files-singular: One file is about to be permanently deleted.
delete-folders-plural: {{count}} folders are about to be permanently deleted.
delete-folders-singular: One folder is about to be permanently deleted.

empty-state.no-uploads: You haven't uploaded any files yet!
empty-state.select-file: Or just select single Images and Videos to add and order them in your Playlist
empty-state.select-folder: Select a Folder to show and update Images and Videos as you add or remove them from the Folder.

error.access-denied: You don't have access to that action. Please contact your Administrator to give you the access you need.
error.blocked-file: This file is being requested too many times and is blocked.
error.delete-verify-company: You cannot delete a file because your account {{username}} doesn't have access to this company. Please login with a different account and try again.
error.duplicate-folder: A Folder already uses that name, please choose a different one
error.folder-inactive-subscription: You cannot add a folder because you don't have an active subscription. Please purchase a subscription and try again.
error.folder-verify-company: You cannot create a folder because your account {{username}} doesn't have access to this company. Please login with a different account and try again.

move.both-root-or-trash: Source and destination must be both in Root or in Trash.
move.destination-must-not-exist: Destination folder already contains a file with that name.
move.invalid-name: The new name cannot have slashes.
move.must-be-different: You cannot move these files or folders into the same folder. Please select a different folder and try again.
move.root-not-valid: Source and destination cannot point to the root folder.
move.subfolders-not-valid: Source and destination cannot be subfolders of each other.
move.unknown: An error occured while moving. Please try again.

error.not-authorized: Your account {{username}} doesn't have access to this company. Please login with a different account and try again.
error.restore-inactive-subscription: You cannot restore the file from trash because you don't have an active subscription. Please purchase a subscription and try again.
error.restore-verify-company: You cannot restore the file from trash because your account {{username}} doesn't have access to this company. Please login with a different account and try again.
error.signed-url-verify-company: The download failed because your account {{username}} does not have access to this company. Please log in with a different account and try again.
error.trash-inactive-subscription: You cannot move the file to trash because you don't have an active subscription. Please purchase a subscription and try again.
error.trash-verify-company: You cannot move the file to trash because your account {{username}} doesn't have access to this company. Please login with a different account and try again.
error.upload-inactive-subscription: You cannot upload files because you don't have an active subscription. Please purchase a subscription and try again.
error.upload-uri-request-failed-mail: Upload failed for {{username}}. Please try again.
error.upload-verify-company: The upload failed because your account {{username}} does not have access to this company. Please log in with a different account and try again.

failed.trash: Move to trash failed. Please try again.

pending-operation.leave-page: There are tasks in progress. If you close this window they won't be completed.

error.both-files-or-folders: Source and destination must be both files or folders.
error.both-root-or-trash: Source and destination must be both in Root or in Trash.
error.destination-must-not-exist: Name is in use, please choose another.
error.invalid-name: The new name cannot have slashes.
error.must-be-different: The new name must be different.
error.root-not-valid: Source and destination cannot point to the root folder.
error.subfolders-not-valid: Source and destination cannot be subfolders of each other.
error.unknown: An error occured while renaming. Please try again.

select-folder-to-update: Select a Folder to show and update Images and Videos as you add or remove them from the Folder.
select-multiple-files-folders-images: Select Images and/or Folders of Images
select-multiple-files-folders-videos: Select Videos and/or Folders of Videos

start-trial.tagline: Manage and deliver media to your digital signage displays, anywhere, anytime.
